sprint_goal: Enable new user onboarding and email verification.
Implement secure user session management including login, logout, and error handling.
Deliver the complete, secure password reset and account recovery flow.
Enhance account security by implementing the full Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA) lifecycle.
Implement temporary account deactivation and the reactivation-on-login flow.
Deliver the GDPR-compliant permanent account deletion workflow and the user security audit trail. (Note: This is a large sprint, US-015 may need to be split).
